Description:

Game LEGO The Lord of the Rings trilogy was created based on Peter Jackson's 
"The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring," "Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers" a
nd "The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King." You are waiting for the famous event, 
but this time they will be drawn to you humans funny plastic LEGO.
Hobbit Frodo entrusted a dangerous thing: to destroy an ancient magical ring that 
threatens the existence of the entire world. The young hero is forced to leave his 
home and go to the sinister Mount Orodruin. However, Ring has its own will and wants 
to return to his horrible master Sauron, and thus the way Frodo is full of dangers 
and adventures. Get ready - you are waiting for the orc ambush, bloodthirsty 
monsters and unknown dangers.
But Frodo is not alone in its path - it helps Brotherhood: ranger Aragorn, 
Gandalf the wizard, elven prince Legolas, Gimli the dwarf-warrior, a representative 
of the principality of people Boromir, Frodo and friends - hobbits Sam, Merry and Pippin.

Features repack

LEGO The Lord of the Rings
Do not cut / recoded
